text: Doves is an English alternative rock band. They formed in 1998 when the two Williams brothers (Jez and Andy) met Jimi Goodwin in high school. Doves newest album is The Places Between: The Best of Doves and was released on April 5, 2010. == Discography == Doves have released 5 studio albums: Year Album 2000 Lost Souls 2002 The Last Broadcast 2005 Some Cities 2009 Kingdom of Rust 2010 The Places Between: The Best of Doves 2020 The Universal Want ==References== ==Websites== Doves' Official website Category:1998 establishments in England Category:1990s British music groups Category:2000s British music groups Category:2010s British music groups Category:Cheshire Category:English rock bands Category:Musical groups established in 1998
title: Doves (band)
